description: This source file defines a Flutter widget 'HomeShell' that manages the main navigation of the application using a BottomNavigationBar and IndexedStack to switch between different screens such as Vocabulary, Phrases, and Practice.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: Main widget representing the primary navigation shell with BottomNavigationBar.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State class managing the current index and rendering the scaffold with navigation and pages.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the HomeShell widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeShell, including Scaffold with AppBar, IndexedStack, and BottomNavigationBar.
